entry.summary: An airplane hangar with 12 classic cars inside caught fire Monday evening near Felts Field, a small airfield in the Hucrest neighborhood.

entry.title: Abandoned US Navy grave marker found
entry.summary: An abandoned trailer on a veteran’s property in Eugene was covered in weeds and blackberry bushes that permeated the trailer inside and out. When the trailer was hauled out of the brush, inside was found a large, heavy, copper grave…

entry.title: BEACH HAZARDS MONDAY
entry.summary: September 18, 2023 3:50 a.m. A Beach Hazards Statement is in effect through Monday evening for beaches in Douglas, Coos and Curry counties. entry.summary: September 17, 2023 3:50 p.m. Firefighters are focusing on mop up, on the Tyee Ridge Complex, northwest of Roseburg. The complex is listed at 7,939 acres and is 83 percent contained. 705 people are assigned to the fires. entry.title: ROSEBURG MISSES RECORD HIGH TEMPERATURE
entry.summary: September 17, 2023 6:30 a.m. Roseburg missed setting a new record high temperature for the date Saturday, but not by much. Forecasters at the National Weather Service said the mercury reached 92 degrees at the Roseburg Regional Airport. The record high for September 16th was 93 degrees, set in 2008. Temperatures are starting to cool...

entry.summary: Riddle Roots Community Projects is moving forward on the Riddle Activity Center Capital Campaign by hosting a kick-off event Tuesday. The event will be held at the future grounds of the activity center from 2:30 to 7 p.m.

entry.title: ROSEBURG SETS NEW RECORD HIGH FOR THE DAY ON FRIDAY
entry.summary: September 16,2023 6:20 a.m. Roseburg set a new record high for the date on Friday.
